attributes.action: More power to the police force
attributes.additional_details: Police officers are no longer able to protect the community efficiently, there is too much paper work and regulations they must follow. Society has lost faith in them. It is for this reason that the police force need to be given more power in stopping these criminals, such as the use of physical handling and the use of tasers. This would send a message to any other criminals that they are not above the law, and that their human rights are not more important than the law abiding citizens of the United Kingdom.
